attributes.action: Its time to close the BBC-Their propaganda is endangering the balance of society
attributes.additional_details: Its not even propaganda anymore! Its dangerously one sided and its time it was held to account and abolished so that we can get some truth and objectivity on our TV screens
attributes.background: The recent bias of the BBC in covering pre/post brexit, the economy and politics in general has stooped to an all time low. It is now to the point that it is a danger to our nations future because some people actually believe what they hear because its the BBC.
